member.name: M:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Extensions.PublishedContentExtensions.GetOutboundRedirect(Umbraco.Core.Models.IPublishedContent)
member.summary:
Gets an instance of representing the outbound redirect from the property with alias skyRedirect.
This method will ensure that you'll always get an instance of even though the property may not hold a redirect. You can then use the property to check that the redirect is in fact valid.
member.param: The content item holding the property.

member.name: M:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Extensions.PublishedContentExtensions.GetOutboundRedirect(Umbraco.Core.Models.IPublishedContent,System.String)
member.summary:
Gets an instance of representing the outbound redirect from the property with specified alias .
This method will ensure that you'll always get an instance of even though the property may not hold a redirect. You can then use the property to check that the redirect is in fact valid.
member.param: The content item holding the property.
The alias of the property.

member.name: T:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Models.RedirectLinkItem
member.summary: Class representing a single link item.

member.name: P:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Models.RedirectLinkItem.Id
member.summary: Gets the ID of the selected content or media. If an URL has been selected, this will return 0.

member.name: P:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Models.RedirectLinkItem.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the link.

member.name: P:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Models.RedirectLinkItem.Url
member.summary:
Gets the URL of the link. Since the URL of a content or media item may change over time (eg. if renamed or moved), this property will attempt to retrieve the current URL from the relevant Umbraco cache.
If is , the URL of the content item will be retrieved through the content cache (if available). In a similar way, if is the URL of the media item will be retrieved through the media cache (if available). The original URL as saved in Umbraco can be accessed through the property.

member.name: P:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Models.RedirectLinkItem.Mode
member.summary: Gets the mode (or type) of the link.

member.name: P:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Models.RedirectLinkItem.IsValid
member.summary: Gets whether the link is valid.

member.name: P:Skybrud.Umbraco.Redirects.Models.RedirectLinkItem.RawUrl
member.summary: Gets the raw URL as saved in Umbraco. The URL may be wrong if referencing content or media that has been renamed, moved or similar.

member.summary: Gets an instance of representing a paginated search for redirects.
member.param: The page to be returned (default is 1)
The maximum amount of redirects to be returned per page (default is 20).

A string value that should be present in either the text or URL of the returned redirects. Default is null.

member.summary: Adds a new redirect.
member.param: The root node ID. 0 indicates a global redirect.
The inbound URL of the redirect.
The mode/type of the destination link.
The media or content ID of the destination link.
The URL of the destination link.
The name of the destination link.
Indicates whether the redirect should be permanent. Default is true.

Indicates whether the query string should be forwarded. false by default.
